channel.title: Which group addicts more Runescape Or WoW?
channel.description: I personally pick Runescape, I think there are more on runescape they just aren't documented as much as WoW addicts.

item.title: Which group addicts more Runescape Or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @Dell451 Dell451
item.description:
@Dell451 wrote:

Nah, WoW has more players, but RS is way more addicting

"Butters, Go and buy WoW,and install it on your computer and meet us in the designated place tonight, before we all murder you."
-South Park

Read full topic

item.title: Which group addicts more Runescape Or WoW?

item.description:
@allserversuck wrote:

[quote=“Slayerexpert, post:10, topic:45596”]But more people have committed suicide over Runescape, whereas people just plain died playing WoW. But I’d have to say WoW is more addicting anyways (even though I tried the 10 day pass and got bored of it).[/quote]how do you get the pass??!

item.title: Which group addicts more Runescape Or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @Dell451 Dell451
item.description:
@Dell451 wrote:

Yes, but they have no choice, on Run Escape ( :rolleyes:) you have paying & free versoins, unlike WoW (world of Wastedtime)

P.S. WoW stole my real friends, who usta play rs with me, like I said before, WoW
ate into their brains and make them weak…so I slayed them, and gianed 780 slaying exp!

item.title: Which group addicts more Runescape Or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

I’d say WoW. I believe RuneScape has only 1-1.5 million paying players. WoW has over 7 million players and they all pay. That’s addiction

item.title: Which group addicts more Runescape Or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @Dell451 Dell451
item.description:
@Dell451 wrote:

jcs_double:

there was a big runescape “craze” at school i played long after that now i’m over and now the wow “craze”

Same here, so i killed them all, because they were…Weak[br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2007, 04:56:34 PM[/size][hr][quote=“jawakult, post:19, topic:45596”][quote author=kemico2 link=topic=63345.msg775786#msg775786 date=1168854765]

But more people have committed suicide over Runescape, whereas people just plain died playing WoW. But I’d have to say WoW is more addicting anyways (even though I tried the 10 day pass and got bored of it).

People have commited suicide over Runescape, who?
[/quote]

some Danish kid who got hijacked, its on the RS news page somewhere last year.

RS players are way more addicted, or at least unreasonably addicted given how much better WOW looks and plays.
And yes, I am an RS player - no I don’t understand it thus I guess addiction is the only explination for me :-p[/quote]
Hijacked? Do you mean Cracked?

item.title: Which group addicts more Runescape Or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @jawakult jawakult
item.description:
@jawakult wrote:

[quote=“kemico2, post:14, topic:45596”][quote author=Slayerexpert link=topic=63345.msg759492#msg759492 date=1168511076]
But more people have committed suicide over Runescape, whereas people just plain died playing WoW. But I’d have to say WoW is more addicting anyways (even though I tried the 10 day pass and got bored of it).
[/quote]

People have commited suicide over Runescape, who?[/quote]

some Danish kid who got hijacked, its on the RS news page somewhere last year.

RS players are way more addicted, or at least unreasonably addicted given how much better WOW looks and plays.
And yes, I am an RS player - no I don’t understand it thus I guess addiction is the only explination for me :-p

item.title: Which group addicts more Runescape Or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @kennyboy93 kennyboy93
item.description:
@kennyboy93 wrote:

I like to think of it like this.
If you take away all the bots, Runescape really doesn’t look that good numberwise.
And also, WoW is a better game in just about all aspects, so WoW gets my vote.

Obviously wow, cause there are like 7 million people playing, and only about 1 million people in rs.
[/quote]

There where 5 million RS accounts in 2002.[/quote]

WoW has 8 million by now, and in Runescape you need to make new account for every char, in WoW you can do as many chars as you want with one account

item.title: Which group addicts more Runescape Or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

WoW for sure because when you get to endgame raiding guild, you need to play like 5 times per week, and be active or else it’s guild kick.

Runescape has no goals, it’s just leveling up skills all the time, so it gets boring.
But in WoW when you go to instances with 39 other people like 5 times per week, it will become a community. And it’s hell of good feeling when you kill one big eng game boss for the first time…

Read full topic
